column4: i installed ubuntu last night, but sound doesnt seem to be working...
can anyone help me get sound server working?
you need to det execute permission on the script first
can someone help me get sound working? i need my music...
are you on warty or hoary
0000:00:0c.0 Multimedia audio controller: Ensoniq 5880 AudioPCI (rev 02)    <<< i think thats a sound card?
check your sound volume - it may be muted by default
it says enable sound server startup and its ticked
You want "PCM" up to about 2/3 (in Volume Control-Playback) and Volume and CD to about the same (in Volume Control-Capture)
Nothing important - at least on standard setups
What about the master volume, and CD?
